home.name: Andris Berzkalns
home.title: Full-stack web developer - Riga, Latvia
home.description: I'm a Javascript developer specialized in ReactJS front-end and Meteor back-end application development. Greater than 2 year professional work experience and freelance experience. Besides coding I enjoy making computer graphics with Adobe software.
projects.jdkmarupe.description: Project created with the Laravel framework and Blade template. The website contains a public page and an admin page for content management.
projects.aribabox.description: A woodworking e-commerce website that sells DXF files. Project consists of the development of the website, email marketing tool utilization, Instruction generation tool development.
projects.portfolio.description: This website was created as a personal project to showcase past professional experiences.
